languages.text: В руках Идиры могущественное устройство, известное как пси-удушитель. Она просит у Вольного Торговца совета, как поступить со зловещим ксеносским творением.

traits.locale_text: Помогите Идире решить, стоит ли ей надевать пси-дампер.

languages.text: Idira now holds in her hands a powerful device known as a psy-stifler. She has turned to the Rogue Trader for guidance on what she should do with this ominous xenocreation.
languages.original_text: В руках Идиры могущественное устройство, известное как пси-удушитель. Она просит у Вольного Торговца совета, как поступить со зловещим ксеносским творением.

traits.locale_text: Idira now holds in her hands a powerful device known as a psy-stifler. She has turned to the Rogue Trader for guidance on what she should do with this ominous xenocreation.
Idira now holds in her hands a powerful device known as a psy-stifler. She has turned to the Rogue Trader for guidance on what she should do with this ominous xenocreation.
Idira now holds in her hands a powerful device known as a psy-stifler. She has turned to the Rogue Trader for guidance on what she should do with this ominous xenocreation.
Idira now holds in her hands a powerful device known as a psy-stifler. She has turned to the Rogue Trader for guidance on what she should do with this ominous xenocreation.

languages.text: Idira tient désormais entre ses mains un puissant dispositif que l'on appelle un carcan psychique. Elle a demandé conseil {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} quant à la manière d'utiliser cette inquiétante xénocréation.
languages.original_text: Idira now holds in her hands a powerful device known as a psy-stifler. She has turned to the Rogue Trader for guidance on what she should do with this ominous xenocreation.

traits.locale_text: Idira tient désormais entre ses mains un puissant dispositif que l'on appelle un carcan psychique. Elle a demandé conseil {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} quant à la manière d'utiliser cette inquiétante xénocréation.

languages.text: 伊迪拉得到了一件强大的装置，叫做灵能抑制器。她向行商浪人寻求指引，想要了解该如何处理这件不祥的异形造物。
languages.original_text: Idira now holds in her hands a powerful device known as a psy-stifler. She has turned to the Rogue Trader for guidance on what she should do with this ominous xenocreation.

traits.locale_text: 伊迪拉得到了一件强大的装置，叫做灵能抑制器。她向行商浪人寻求指引，想要了解该如何处理这件不祥的异形造物。

languages.text: イディラの手にはサイ・スティフラーという強力な装置が握られている。彼女はこの不吉な異種族の創造物をどうすべきか、自由開拓者にアドバイスを求めた。
languages.original_text: Idira now holds in her hands a powerful device known as a psy-stifler. She has turned to the Rogue Trader for guidance on what she should do with this ominous xenocreation.

traits.locale_text: イディラの手にはサイ・スティフラーという強力な装置が握られている。彼女はこの不吉な異種族の創造物をどうすべきか、自由開拓者にアドバイスを求めた。

languages.text: Idira hält in ihren Händen nun ein mächtiges Gerät, einen Psi-Drossler. Sie hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} um Rat gefragt, was sie mit diesem bedrohlich wirkenden Xeno-Artefakt tun soll.
languages.original_text: Idira now holds in her hands a powerful device known as a psy-stifler. She has turned to the Rogue Trader for guidance on what she should do with this ominous xenocreation.

traits.locale_text: Idira hält in ihren Händen nun ein mächtiges Gerät, einen Psi-Drossler. Sie hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} um Rat gefragt, was sie mit diesem bedrohlich wirkenden Xeno-Artefakt tun soll.

languages.text: Idira tiene en sus manos un poderoso dispositivo: un supresor psíquico. Acude a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para que le indique qué debe hacer con este ominoso instrumento xenos.
languages.original_text: Idira now holds in her hands a powerful device known as a psy-stifler. She has turned to the Rogue Trader for guidance on what she should do with this ominous xenocreation.

traits.locale_text: Idira tiene en sus manos un poderoso dispositivo: un supresor psíquico. Acude a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para que le indique qué debe hacer con este ominoso instrumento xenos.

languages.text: İdira, elinde ruhboğan olarak bilinen güçlü bir cihaz tutuyor. Bu uğursuz zeno yaratımıyla ne yapması gerektiğini söylemesi için Hür Tacir'e döndü.
languages.original_text: Idira now holds in her hands a powerful device known as a psy-stifler. She has turned to the Rogue Trader for guidance on what she should do with this ominous xenocreation.
